@RichardCrouch1 I will forward this on to our Field team. If you can DM with your contact details so that the team can contact you back.

Our Chair @EmmaHowardBoyd has met with construction industry leaders to call for more investment in low-carbon infrastructure, highlighting the need for collaboration, courage & speed to keep pace with climate change: https://t.co/DrgZ2TRmEQ

@CBItweets @CommonsEAC #netzero https://t.co/Ahcs8CfpMM

Our fabulous #Lancashire field teams have removed this blockage from Savick Brook in #Preston today. 

Blockages like this one impact on the flow of our rivers and can increase #flood risk. 

If you see a blocked river, report it to us 24/7 on 0800 80 70 60. https://t.co/GGcIRXeITu

tweets.text: It’s #InternationalWomensDay. I am proud of my colleagues - the incredible women in #TeamEA who are tackling the #ClimateEmergency @wifo_ea @WomenInFCERM #wifo #ChooseToChallenge #IWD2021 #TogetherForOurPlanet https://t.co/mMQOvSezVj

Read more here: https://t.co/3uE4djlG1S #Fish #Essex https://t.co/stXi0btJrJ

tweets.text: @Newcast42068272 @MrMarkwarren1 @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe Thanks 😊 I’ll get onto the various managements...there will be further announcements soon - for the ‘Stink they will come’ as I’ve just driven through Clayton and the Westlands and it’s rancid...SAME OLD STINK! SOS #sos #stopthestink #stinkfest https://t.co/iEXCpGQtPC

@scottdegg @Newcast42068272 @MrMarkwarren1 @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe It was stinking near Edenhurst School at teatime, wonder how parents their feel about their kids going back, stench swirling around now, it's in hall& downstairs rooms, give it an hour & I'll be ringing, hope EA officers are local tonight.

@MissMaisyDaisy @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe @piersmorgan @SimonTagg @AaronBell4NUL #StopTheStench #WalleysQuarry

Also woke me up last night,like a big gas leak/burning oil smell .I am 2.9 miles away.
Sore throat and nose now,little sleep, 
lets play the Is it Covid or just pollution guessing game!!!!

@EnvAgencyMids @CommunitiesPrep I’m interested when will you have a webinar to discuss the Environmental crisis with @PHE_uk relating to Walleys Landfill-health & stink issues effecting 1000’s! @EnvAgency failure to act is a disgrace @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @AaronBell4NUL #stopthestink @StinkStopthe

📢 SPEAKER ANNOUNCEMENT📢 

Dave Bass, advisor - local authority unit @EnvAgency is presenting on 'Combusting woody biomass– A legislative update' in the #EnergyNowExpo session at #LowCarbonAgri online.

Learn more and pre-register for the show FREE here>>>https://t.co/4P5Qp0jAJN https://t.co/4GhSDoMBK9

Here’s my speech “The Green Industrial Revolution needs strong Green Industrial Regulation” from this morning’s @AldersgateGrp event on “Fostering Posterity”: https://t.co/y08Fb11xSl

#TogetherForOurPlanet #COP26 https://t.co/J6R0P6pYwL

If you have been affected by large-scale waste crime, it's time to share your experiences through @EnvAgency's National Waste Crime Survey 2021. Find out more about how to get involved below 👇 https://t.co/4TmsyMvBST

Where are the women @AlokSharma_RDG?

We met you 3 months ago about the lack of gender diversity at the top of @COP26 UK leadership team & we've seen no progress.

We need a 50:50 balance of women at the top. What’s your action plan? #ChooseToChallenge #SHEChangesClimate #IWD2021 https://t.co/CSqwPtWnLa

tweets.text: Today #StourFieldTeam had a trip up the #GreatStour in #Westbere near #Canterbury identifying fallen trees to be removed at our earliest convenience, none of these trees have immediate #FloodRisk ⁦@EnvAgencySE⁩  ⁦@Kent_cc⁩  ⁦@canterburycc⁩ ⁦@ADA_updates⁩ https://t.co/p6Y8jkWTRq
